data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Matale, Sri Lanka to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Matale, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Matale, Sri Lanka. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
God, we pray for the believers in Matale, Sri Lanka to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Spirit, help the 3 believers find a person of peace today among the 36,397 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Tondagattan people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Matale, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 12,133 neighbors who are far from you in Matale. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 3 believers in Matale.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

location.name: Matale
location.people_groups_list: Radayo, Bania, Sindhi (Muslim traditions), Baloch, Vannan (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Radayo (1,700), Bania (16,000), Sindhi (Muslim traditions) (1,000), Baloch (900), Vannan (Hindu traditions) (25,000)
